prompt.prompt:
Fix the bug in the following code. The bug is on the line commented below:
```python=
def wrap(text, cols):
    lines = []
    while len(text) > cols:
        end = text.rfind(' ', 0, cols + 1)
        if end == -1:
            end = cols
        line, text = text[:end], text[end:]
        lines.append(line)
 # The bug is here
    return lines
```
Fixed code:

sample.bug_detail_desc: 在回傳前缺少append text，造成回傳結果缺少最後一段，導致空值以外的輸入結果皆會出錯
